name: Programming Hero
description: Programming Hero is a fun and interactive way to learn programming. Whether you're a beginner or looking to brush up your skills, this app makes learning to code exciting and practical.

reviews.comment: Best app for beginners! The lessons are super easy to follow and engaging.

name: Khan Academy
description: Khan Academy offers practice exercises, instructional videos, and a personalized learning dashboard for learners to study at their own pace.
features: Thousands of lessons in math, science, and more

reviews.comment: This app helped me a lot with my math homework!

name: Duolingo
description: Duolingo makes learning a new language fun and addictive with quick, game-like lessons.

reviews.comment: Love the layout and gamified system, but I wish it had more cultural context.

name: Photomath
description: Photomath allows you to scan math problems and provides step-by-step solutions instantly.

reviews.comment: This app is a lifesaver for understanding complex math problems!

name: Coursera
description: Coursera partners with universities and organizations to offer courses online for anyone to take, for free.

reviews.comment: Great for professional development, though some courses are quite long.

name: Brainly
description: Brainly is a social learning app where students can ask and answer homework questions.

reviews.comment: Super useful when I'm stuck on a problem late at night.

name: Quizlet
description: Quizlet helps students practice and master what they’re learning through flashcards, games, and tests.

reviews.comment: Flashcards are a game changer for memorizing vocabulary!

name: BYJU'S
description: BYJU’S offers online learning programs for students from classes 1 to 12, featuring engaging video lessons and personalized learning journeys.

reviews.comment: Great app, though some content requires a subscription.
